Text.Page:
Welcome to the fight, soldier! Met ol' Charging Cafnil? He try to kill you yet? Stick by us, you'll do all right.

Our business is disrupting the cult's food supply. Look north. That big collective farm? Bunch of exhausted lunatics work it while well-rested lunatics drive them on.

So we're gonna kill the well-rested ones! Take out every {@LinkCreature:17#103#Heavens Fall overseer} and their {@LinkCreature:17#102#laborers}. Hmm. Take any farm tools you find, too!

Got 'em? And how many? Oooh, bet they're pissed now! Nice job.

Don't go anywhere, kidâ€”we got more damage to do!
Mug those {@LinkCreature:17#103#Heavens Fall overseers} for their farm equipment. If any {@LinkCreature:17#102#laborers} give you trouble, off them too.
